text: Marie Hermanson (born 1956) is a Swedish writer and journalist. ==Bibliography== *Det finns ett hål i verkligheten - 1986 *Snövit - 1990 *Tvillingsystrarna - 1993 *Värddjuret - 1995 *Musselstranden - 1998 *Ett oskrivet blad - 2001 *Hembiträdet - 2004 *Mannen under trappan - 2005 *Svampkungens son - 2007 *Himmelsdalen - 2011 *Skymningslandet - 2014 == Awards == * Partille Bookstore's Writer's Scholarship -1997 * Bokhandelns val - 2005 ===Nominations=== August Prize - 1995 (for Värddjuret). ==References== ==Other websites== *official website Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish writers
title: Marie Hermanson
